result.eng: Strangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ga: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn
result.orig: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn
result.html: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Aisteaċ go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíoċta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.

result.eng: Some of the people were left unhappy.
result.ga: Fágadh cuid de na daoine míshásta
result.orig: Fágadh cuid de na daoine míshásta
result.html: Fágadh cuid de na daoine míshástaSome of the people were left unhappy.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ cuid de na daoine míẛástaSome of the people were left unhappy.

result.eng: Some of the money is still left.
result.ga: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha
result.orig: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha
result.html: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágthaSome of the money is still left.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágṫaSome of the money is still left.

result.eng: She started taking her clothes off.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.

result.eng: She begins to comb her hair.
result.ga: Tosaíonn sí ag cíoradh a cuid gruaige
result.orig: Tosaíonn sí ag cíoradh a cuid gruaige
result.html: Tosaíonn sí ag cíoradh a cuid gruaigeShe begins to comb her hair.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn sí ag cíoraḋ a cuid gruaigeShe begins to comb her hair.

result.ga: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainn
result.orig: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainn
result.html: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainnHer hair is beautiful.
result.ponchtml: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainnHer hair is beautiful.

result.eng: I have spent some of the money.
result.ga: Tá cuid den airgead caite agam
result.orig: Tá cuid den airgead caite agam
result.html: Tá cuid den airgead caite agamI have spent some of the money.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuid den airgead caite agamI have spent some of the money.

result.eng: They drank some of the whiskey.
result.ga: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.orig: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.html: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beathaThey drank some of the whiskey.
result.ponchtml: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beaṫaThey drank some of the whiskey.

result.eng: Her hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ga: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.orig: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.html: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteachHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a cuid gruaige greamaiṫe dá baiṫis ag an mbáisteaċHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: Níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
